description: The Korean fir (Abies koreana 'Silberlocke')is an amazing species of coniferous tree due to its unique beauty and toughness. Its majestic, narrow conical shape stands out among other firs and its impressive height reaches upto 30 meters. Its silver-gray needles with prominent white stripes present a remarkable contrast. With its ability to sustain in tough weather conditions and low temperatures, this species is a great choice for garden enthusiasts. Additionally, it is also known for its long-lasting soft needles and impressive resistance to predators and diseases. All in all, the Korean fir is an amazing plant species admired for its beauty and practicality.
